CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Metro Center?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Metro Center is arc {North Hub}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Metro Center?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Metro Center is arc {South Gate}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {South Gate} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Grand Terminal} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from North Hub to Grand Terminal in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from South Gate to Grand Terminal in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Metro Center and North Hub in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Metro Center and North Hub is {116}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Grand Terminal and North Hub in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Grand Terminal and North Hub is {109}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Grand Terminal?
SC.A: The total flow output from Grand Terminal is {167}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Grand Terminal?
SC.A: The total flow input by Grand Terminal is {241}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 116? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {117} from {North Hub} to {Grand Terminal}, a flow of {117} from {South Gate} to {North Hub}, a flow of {124} from {South Gate} to {Grand Terminal}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 66? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {25} from {South Gate} to {Metro Center}, a flow of {58} from {Grand Terminal} to {South Gate}, a flow of {18} from {Metro Center} to {North Hub}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 89 and 106? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {104} from {Metro Center} to {South Gate}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from North Hub to Grand Terminal or from Grand Terminal to North Hub?
NC.A: The flow from {North Hub} to {Grand Terminal} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from South Gate to Grand Terminal, from South Gate to Metro Center, or from Grand Terminal to North Hub?
NC.A: The flow from {South Gate} to {Grand Terminal} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {North Hub}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Grand Terminal} and {North Hub}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Metro Center, Arc North Hub, Arc South Gate, Arc Grand Terminal}.
